data.name: Ritual Night
data.detailed_description:
Discord


About the Game

Rogue-lite party social deduction game with light stealth elements and no early player elimination. After each day, the party evolves with cleverly randomized magic powers given to both sides, the more powerful the later the rounds! Complete the ritual to summon the mighty Cthulhu while the uninvited humans cause chaos to crash the party.

The Monsters vs Uninvited Humans

You have all been invited as guests to the yearly monsters-only party. Watch out for the icky humans who have snuck in, trying to sabotage the ritual. Will they crash your party?


Monster Goal: Summon Cthulhu-Complete the Ritual or Sacrifice the Humans
  • Win by gathering enough ingredients, completing enough rituals, or sacrificing the humans
  • Complete minigames to gather ingredients
  • Complete the ritual with the needed ingredients
  • Use your newly acquired magic spells to figure out the humans
  • Vote who is sus to sacrifice to Cthulhu


Human Goal: Prank Guests and Sabotage The Ritual
  • Win by pranking guests and sabotaging the rituals while avoid being sacrificed
  • Disguise as the other NPCs and act like them to stealth and sneak around
  • Prank guests to take them out of the next ritual
  • Steal ingredients from guests
  • Cause chaos with your newly acquired magic powers


Monsters work together in order to complete the ritual by adding the necessary number of ingredients while the humans try to deceive and sabotage the ritual. Figure out who to trust and who is lying amongst you!


Charming Customization: Charm your fellow monsters by customizing your fins, tail, pets, magic effects, hats, jewelry, and more to come!

data.short_description: Rogue-lite social deduction party game where each day gets more chaotic. After each day, both sides gain powerful magic such as pickpocket, polymorph, clone, and banish to deceive or deduce their opposition. With light stealth mechanics & no early player elimination, each playthrough is unique.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo 2.4ghz+
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i-5 2.8Ghz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia 600 Series GPU or Equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 350 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: OSX 10.14
  • Processor: Core i-3 4th Generation or Higher
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Integrated HD 6100+
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Latest OSX Version
  • Processor: 2.3GHz dual-core Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Iris Plus Graphics 640
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 350 MB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
